Text: I took these from the original tapes. I think one of the stories has a momentary dropout, a second, maybe two, but these are hard to come by these days so hopefully it won't detract too much from the enjoyment of what I think are the finest recordings of these great stories.
Thanks.  I have the Robert Powell readings, all the stories in book form and all the film/tv versions still available.  Wonderful ghost stories.
mgf doesn't seem to be seeding but neil1966hardy also has the Argos recordings for anyone interested.
Seems to be seeding here, but I'll happily take it down.
